name: Plant trees in the city
address: 12601 Mulholland Drive, Beverley Hills, CA, USA
description: Come spend the morning with the City of Huntington Park and TreePeople in caring for trees that add beauty and much needed shade to our community.
tasks: Prepare soil for planting (tilling and watering),
Digging of holes and calculation of space between plantings
Place and stake the sapling

name: Restore the Angeles forest
address: Mount Mooney Road, Palmdale, CA, 93550, USA
description: Below the rocky hills of the Sierra Pelona mountains, next to a creek leading to the Santa Clara River, we will be restoring an area of the wildlands damaged by the Copper Fire by caring for the native chaparral plants which provide deer, coyotes and others with food and shelter.
tasks: Pruning and watering chaparral plants damaged in a recent fire
Preparing food for local wildlife
Creating spaces that can be used as wildlife shelter

name: Barceloneta sea initiative
address: Passeig del Mare Nostrum, 15, 08039, Barcelona, Spain
description: Barcelona's beaches have filled up with trash of all types. You can make a difference by joining our litter collection effort to keep trash out of the sea.
tasks: Pick up trash on the beach and add the a communal pile
Split up trash by categories for recycling

name: Bogatell sea initiative
address: Xiringuito Escribà, Av. del Litoral, 62, Barcelona, Spain
description: Barcelona's beaches have filled up with trash of all types. You can make a difference by joining our litter collection effort to keep trash out of the sea.
tasks: Pick up trash on the beach and add the a communal pile
Split up trash by categories for recycling

name: Castelldefels sea initiative
description: Barcelona's beaches have filled up with trash of all types. You can make a difference by joining our litter collection effort to keep trash out of the sea.
tasks: Pick up trash on the beach and add the a communal pile
Split up trash by categories for recycling

name: Sitges sea initiative
description: Barcelona's beaches have filled up with trash of all types. You can make a difference by joining our litter collection effort to keep trash out of the sea.
tasks: Pick up trash on the beach and add the a communal pile
Split up trash by categories for recycling

name: Beach Clean Up
address: Carrer de Miquel Servet, 14, 12003 Castelló de la Plana, Castellón, Spain
description: Contribute to the 8,000kg of trash that has been picked up by Pure Clean Earth volunteers. Join the weekly beach clean up and become a member of the anti-plastic movement.
tasks: Commit to a joining a weekly clean up
Pick up trash found on the beach using the gloves and trash bags provided

name: Beach Clean Up
address: Passeig de la Ribera, 33, 08870 Sitges, Barcelona, Spain
description: Contribute to the 8,000kg of trash that has been picked up by Pure Clean Earth volunteers. Join the weekly beach clean up and become a member of the anti-plastic movement.
tasks: Commit to a joining a weekly clean up
Pick up trash found on the beach using the gloves and trash bags provided

name: Campaign to Clean Oil Spill in Chile
address: Vicuña Mackenna 202, Quintero, Región de Valparaíso, Chile
description: A sizeable oil spill had occurred in Quintero Bay, harming local marine life and jeopardizing the local fishing communities. Help us lobby and campaign to clean up this mess and conserve the ocean.
tasks: Share information about the oil spill with your community via email and social media
Contact chilean legislators to lobby for adequate cleanup of the oil and support to the communities affected
Take part in drafting policy suggestions to prevent oil spills in the future

name: Campaign to Stop Offshore Oil Drilling in Belize
address: 111 North Front Street, Belize City, Belize
description: Offshore exporation and drilling in Belize is devastasting the barrier reef. Join the campaign to prevent the company Princess Petroleum from continuing to destroy the environment.
tasks: Share information about offshore oil drilling with your community via email and social media
Contact legislators in Belize to lobby for the passing of effective legislation to prevent the drilling
Take part in drafting policy suggestions

name: Wildlife Care and Rehabilitation
description: Most animals arrive at Chipangali with some level of injury or trauma. Depending on your level of experience, you’ll help treat wounds and infections, as well as providing intensive care.
tasks: Help dress wounds, give medical treatment and monitor sick animals
Accompany the centre’s wildlife manager into the field to dart animals, when possible
Help prepare a nutritious diet

name: Wildlife Conservation Research
description: With permission from the National Parks and Wildlife Authority and in collaboration with Birmingham Zoo, USA, Chipangali is carrying out a detailed study of the territory and movement patterns of leopards and hyena (both brown and spotted).
role: Research, monitoring and practical conservation work
tasks: Set physical traps to dart and collar animals, enabling conservationists to track their movement
Research animals’ territory sizes and hunting areas to reduce human-wildlife conflict
Set up remote camera traps to monitor wildlife

name: Clean Air Campaign
description: There are 40,000 premature deaths a year in the UK linked with air pollution. We are launching a campaing to raise awareness and to make this issue a priority for our legislators.
tasks: Set up social media accounts for the campaign and promote them
Come up with messaging for the campaign's internal and external communications
Create an activist kit for citizens who are interested in getting involved

name: Leftover Timber Furniture-making
address: Av. Ignacio Morones Prieto 2525 Pte, Loma Larga, 64710 Monterrey, Mexico
description: Ten indigenous Maya women are starting a furniture-making business that uses cut-offs from Lacandon Rainforest. They recycle from the local sawmill to raise awareness about the dangers of deforestation in their area. The budding entreprenership is in need of an experienced website developer.
tasks: Build a professional e-commerce website in both English and Spanish
Display catalogue and product line on a website
The developer can work remotely but must visit the business in Monterrey at least once during the development process
